code: import React from"react";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";export default function Navigation(){var url=window.location.pathname;var tabActiveOnCreate=function tabActiveOnCreate(url){if(url.indexOf("create-imagery")>0||url.indexOf("create-answer")>0){return"tab-active";}else return"";};var tabActiveOnReview=function tabActiveOnReview(url){if(url.indexOf("review-imagery")>0||url.indexOf("review-answer")>0){return"tab-active";}else return"";};var tabActiveOnAllCards=function tabActiveOnAllCards(url){if(url.indexOf("all-cards")>0){return"tab-active";}else return"";};return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"btn-group d-flex mb-5",role:"navigation","aria-label":"navigation"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Link,{to:"/create-imagery",className:"btn btn-secondary btn-navigation ".concat(tabActiveOnCreate(url))},"Create new"),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Link,{to:"/review-imagery",className:"btn btn-secondary tab-separator btn-navigation ".concat(tabActiveOnReview(url))},"Review"),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Link,{to:"/all-cards",className:"btn btn-secondary tab-separator btn-navigation ".concat(tabActiveOnAllCards(url))},"All cards"));}
